channel.title: How can i donate?
channel.description:
how can i donate, for my server? or like people can donate for me, maybe pm me? i need to know how to make a donate thing so people can donate for me :} if this is wrong section mod+ please lock it :o
i just wont my server dedi :(

item.title: How can i donate?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:5, topic:242995”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=319318.msg2530381#msg2530381 date=1226426571]

Set up a paypal and let them donate towards it.

do i need a credit card and stuff? for the donate paypal,?
[/quote]
Yes… otherwise were would they send money to?
Just set up Google Adsence or w-e it’s called and tell them to click on the ads once a day to support dedi. They don’t really need a credit card or bank statement, you can choose for a check to be sent but of course I may be wrong.[/quote]

k ty mate :]

Read full topic

item.title: How can i donate?
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:4, topic:242995”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=319318.msg2530374#msg2530374 date=1226426192]
Set up a paypal and let them donate towards it.
[/quote]

do i need a credit card and stuff? for the donate paypal,?[/quote]
Yes… otherwise were would they send money to?
Just set up Google Adsence or w-e it’s called and tell them to click on the ads once a day to support dedi. They don’t really need a credit card or bank statement, you can choose for a check to be sent but of course I may be wrong.

Read full topic

@Jordiescape wrote:

Set up a paypal and let them donate towards it.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i donate?
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

Maybe just ask the players for donations or add this to your login message (your’s might be different than mine.)

sM("Accepting donations for dedi -Add something here-.")

If that doesn’t work change the sM to sendMessage or your server’s equivalent to that.

Read full topic
